{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-1-model-b-plus/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = RPF |model = Raspberry Pi Model B |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = + |revision = (512MB) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/03/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/RPF_Raspberry_Pi_Model_B%2B_(512MB) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM2835; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = 1176JZF-S |cpu1spd = 700<!-- 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Elpida;B4432BBPA-1D-F; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = SMSC;LAN9514; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Micro SD Card, USB 2.0, HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI out, Audio out (3.5mm), GPIO |addchip = 3-pin Microprocessor Reset Circuit;Diodes Inc;APX803;;1;,,, Dual PWM Step Down DC-DC Converter;Diodes Inc.;PAM2306;;1;,,, 0.2A Single Channel Current-Limited Load Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2331;;1;,,, P-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;Diodes Inc;DMG2305UX;;1;,,, 150V Dual PNP Transistor;Diodes Inc;DMMT5401;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Sony UK |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2014 |estprice = 35 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = United Kingdom
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|RPF Raspberry Pi series}}
==Links of Interest== {{WPLink|Raspberry Pi}} *[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPiBoard '''elinux.org''''s Raspberry Pi subsection] *[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPi_Boards Board revision table w/ pictures]
*[http://www.raspberrypi.org/archives/6299 ''A birthday present from Broadcom'' on the '''Raspberry Pi Foundation''''s news feed] :Full documentation for the ''VideoCore IV'' graphics core (used in the BCM2835) as :well as a complete source release of the graphics stack used by the BCM21553 :cellphone SoC (which also has a ''VideoCore IV'' core) has been released.
===Models=== :;[https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/ Raspberry Pi products] • [[RPF Raspberry Pi series]] *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B (256MB)]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-1-model-b/ PPage] • [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 ''OpenNet''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @700MHz 1x ARM1176JZF-S (ARMv6 ) : 256MB RAM, 2x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B (512MB)]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-1-model-b/ PPage] • [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 ''OpenNet''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @700MHz 1x ARM1176JZF-S (ARMv6 ) : 512MB RAM, 2x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B+ (512MB)]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-1-model-b-plus/ PPage] • [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 ''OpenNet''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @700MHz 1x ARM1176JZF-S (ARMv6) : 512MB RAM, 4x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 2 Model B (1GB)]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-2-model-b/ PPage] • [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=41585 ''OpenNet''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM2836 @900MHz 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) (ARMv7) :1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0
